                "BEFORE the operation is attempted on a row - insert, update or delete;"
              ]

      "be8330f8-a103-4a2f-9a16-f434f1907377": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
          "alive": true,
          "created_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "created_by_table": "notion_user",
          "created_time": 1550385673474,
          "id": "be8330f8-a103-4a2f-9a16-f434f1907377",
          "ignore_block_count": true,
          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_id": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",
          "last_edited_by_table": "notion_user",
          "last_edited_time": 1550385673474,
          "parent_id": "3cd25b3e-dbb1-4b2c-bbd7-0b3c7ecf1a13",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION add_log_function()\n  RETURNS trigger AS $BODY$\nDECLARE\n  vDescription TEXT;\n  vId INT;\n  vReturn RECORD;\nBEGIN\n    vDescription := TG_TABLE_NAME || ' ';\n     IF (TG_OP = 'INSERT') THEN\n        vId := NEW.id;\n        vDescription := vDescription || 'added. Id: ' || vId;\n        vReturn := NEW;\n    ELSIF (TG_OP = 'UPDATE') THEN\n        vId := NEW.id;\n        vDescription := vDescription || 'updated. Id: ' || vId;\n        vReturn := NEW;\n    ELSIF (TG_OP = 'DELETE') THEN\n        vId := OLD.id;\n        vDescription := vDescription || 'deleted. Id: ' || vId;\n        vReturn := OLD;\n    END IF;\n\n    RAISE NOTICE 'TRIGER called on % - Log: %', TG_TABLE_NAME, vDescription;\n\n    INSERT INTO log \n        (table_name, table_id, description, created_at) \n        VALUES\n        (TG_TABLE_NAME, vId, vDescription, NOW());\n\n    RETURN vReturn;\nEND $BODY$\n  LANGUAGE plpgsql;"
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 1
        }
      },
